title: Insignia is The Match for You! Great Location! Ferry, Food, More!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
It’s your apartment and you are welcome to tour in a way that makes you feel most at home.

Whether you prefer to take a self-guided tour on your own, be accompanied by one of our leasing professionals (when permissible), or take a live video tour from the comfort of your home, we have options that will work for you!
Insignia Apartment Homes in Bremerton, Washington offers newly constructed 1 and 2 bedroom apartments centrally located on the Kitsap Peninsula.

Insignia is less than 2 miles from Harrison Medical Center, a quick 4 mile commute to Naval Base Kitsap, 12 miles to the Bangor Trident Base, and minutes from other major employers in the Bremerton area like the Puget Sound Naval Shipyard and Olympic College.
The community surrounding Insignia Apartment Homes includes many restaurants from Mexican to American fare, you're sure to find a new favorite dining spot.
Shopping and groceries are less than a mile from Insignia at the local Fred Meyer on Wheaton Way.
The one & two bedroom apartments at Insignia include luxury amenities like stainless steel appliances, wood plank style flooring and cozy fireplaces.
Each apartment home at Insignia comes equipped with a washer and dryer, dishwasher and comfortable patio or balcony.
The luxury experience continues with the broad range of community amenities offered at Insignia like the relaxing barbeque area, pet park, fitness center with free weights and clubhouse.
Pet PolicyPet Policy Type:Cats and DogsPet policy:Please contact a community team member for information on pet deposits, fees and rent.
Breed restrictions apply, for a complete list of restricted breeds please contact the community leasing office.
